content: Nothing changed in the code, I just split the files.
I would make a vote for the name of the new file, but I have no idea how to start a vote.
Looks like a good idea to me, and the filename looks fine
My only worry is that it will conflict with any other open PRs against normed_space/basic

@Scott Morrison, are you fine with having to rebase #12326 and #12327?

I think the only other conflict is @Jireh Loreaux's #12132, and that's running into linter problems anyway right now.
I think this is a good move. Maybe the new file name is a bit confusing for people looking for normed rings. Maybe normed_ring_and_field.lean? I don't have a strong opinion here.
I'd lean towards just merging it as is, and bikeshedding the name later
Renaming things is cheap, splitting things creates conflicts quickly
Maybe the thing to do is split again into analysis.normed.field and analysis.normed.ring (in a follow-up PR)
